section.name: Required software
section.p: For details and specific versions supported see the Installation Guide.

subsection.name: Java Development Kit
subsection.p: Java web site | OpenJDK web site
The Java Development Kit (JDK) is required to compile and run. JDK 6 or above is required.

subsection.name: Apache Ant
subsection.p: Build tool used to build SignServer. Version 1.8.0 and up should work.

subsubsection.name: JBoss Application Server
subsubsection.p: For JBoss application server the recommended version is 5.1.0.GA.

subsubsection.name: GlassFish Server
subsubsection.p: For GlassFish the recommended version is Open Source Edition 2.1.1.

subsubsection.name: MySQL
subsubsection.p: MySQL is recommended as SignServer database. MySQL 5.1 is the most tested version.

subsubsection.name: Oracle
subsubsection.p: SignServer has also been tested with Oracle Database.
